title: [LLVM][OpenMP] Add older versions to llvm::omp::getOpenMPVersions
body: Add 3.1 and 4.0 as versions. This will make flang's default OpenMP version (3.1) be included in the list.
commits:
[LLVM][OpenMP] Add older versions to llvm::omp::getOpenMPVersions

Add 3.1 and 4.0 as versions. This will make flang's default OpenMP
version (3.1) be included in the list.
